channel.title: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to do that?
I already have an object, but I really don't know where to put to make it give items/skills.

item.title: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Why is not that simple?

Read full topic

item.title: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Arkamys, post:11, topic:441164”][quote author=cmcmvj link=topic=543839.msg3986632#msg3986632 date=1335975761]
like dzeko said.

object id
if combat level <99 {
add item(item id, amount)
} else {
sendmessage(“You have to be over 100 combat to get items!”);
}
break;

you can find everything you need inside the source.
[/quote]
Where do I add this?
On ObjectHandler?[/quote]
Those are terrible conventions, plus it is not that simple. That isn’t even the correct variable for the skill.

Read full topic

item.title: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:4, topic:441164”]in ActionHandler.java, add this:

case ####: c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); break;

replace “case ####:” by your chest id.
replace “c.getItems().addItem(####, 1);” by your item id… change the 1 to how many you want of them…[/quote]

I don’t have ActionHandler, is there anyway I can add something like:

“you need a combat level of 100 to open this chest”

And make the chest openable once per account?

Read full topic
item.source: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)

item.title: Click on object > Recive items/Skills (On Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

in ActionHandler.java, add this:

case ####: c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1); break;

replace “case ####:” by your chest id.
replace “c.getItems().addItem(####, 1);” by your item id… change the 1 to how many you want of them…

Read full topic
